original: intros f g n x l Heq Hf. induction n. -- simpl in *. rewrite <- Heq. auto. -- simpl in *. apply is_derive_ext_loc with (f := Derive_n f n) (g := Derive_n g n) (x := x) (l := l). ++ unfold locally. intros t. apply Derive_n_ext. auto. ++ apply IHn.
